nodes.text: Stantorrs was a Duros male who served as the Supreme Commander of the Galactic Republic military during the Cold War against the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Ula Vii, secretly an Imperial Agent, reported to Stantorrs directly and was assigned as envoy by Stantorrs himself to go to Nal Hutta. At one point, Stantorrs asked Larin Moxla about the actions of Captain Pipalidi of the attack force on Sebaddon because he was considering promoting the captain to colonel. He was replaced by Rans as Supreme Commander.
